## EthersLiquity.sendLUSD() method

Send LUSD tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendLUSD(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base-u.decimalish.md) | Amount of LUSD to send. |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure. Throws [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers-u.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.
